import React, { useState } from "react" import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { withTranslation } from "react-i18next" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Table, Card, CardBody, Row, Col, Button } from "reactstrap" const CheckList = (props) => { const dataRows = props.results.map((item, index) => ( {item.required} { item.description } {item.exception} { item.approvedBy ? item.approvedBy : '' } { item.approvedDate || '' } { item.updatedBy ? item.updatedBy : '' } { item.updatedDate || '' } { item.expirationDate || '' } { item.comments} ) ); return (

{ props.t("CheckList") }

{dataRows}
{ props.t("Required") } { props.t("Description") } { props.t("Exception") } { props.t("ApprovedBy") } { props.t("ApprovedDate") } { props.t("UpdatedBy") } { props.t("UpdatedDate") } { props.t("ExpirationDate") } { props.t("Comments") } { props.t("Attachment") } { props.t("Received") }
); }; CheckList.propTypes = { items: PropTypes.array.isRequired, addCheckListItem: PropTypes.func }; export default (withTranslation()(CheckList));
